## PCA analysis by population demographics
<div class="columns-2">
  <div class="centered">
  ![](../results/04_analysis_PCA/pca_deaths.png){ width=105%, height=105% }

  - Relative COVID-19 deaths were more informative than absolute deaths
  - PC1 comprises 44.6% of variation
